QuestData.Title: Bots Gone Wild
QuestData.Description:
It's loose up there!
I told them not to do it, but they didn't listen. Now it's gone out of control and killed everyone up there. It's an experimental Whirlbot. They never should have built it!
You need to stop it before it comes down here looking for more victims!
Kill the Whirling Zap-O-Matic.
